@description.name: @description
@description.body:
*****************************************************************

qooxdoo - the new era of web development http://qooxdoo.org Copyright: 2004-2008 1&1 Internet AG, Germany, http://www.1und1.de License: MIT: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT See the LICENSE file in the project's top-level directory for details. Authors: Sebastian Werner (wpbasti) Andreas Ecker (ecker) Martin Wittemann (martinwittemann) Jonathan Wei√ü (jonathan_rass) *

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
A spinner is a control that allows you to adjust a numerical value, typically within an allowed range. An obvious example would be to specify the month of a year as a number in the range 1 - 12. To do so, a spinner encompasses a field to display the current value (a textfield) and controls such as up and down buttons to change that value. The current value can also be changed by editing the display field directly, or using mouse wheel and cursor keys. An optional {@link #numberFormat} property allows you to control the format of how a value can be entered and will be displayed. A brief, but non-trivial example: 

 var s = new qx.ui.form.Spinner();
 s.set({
   maximum: 3000,
   minimum: -3000
 });
 var nf = new qx.util.format.NumberFormat();
 nf.setMaximumFractionDigits(2);
 s.setNumberFormat(nf);

A spinner instance without any further properties specified in the constructor or a subsequent set command will appear with default values and behaviour.

@childControl.name: @childControl
@childControl.body: textfield {qx.ui.form.TextField} holds the current value of the spinner
@childControl.description: holds the current value of the spinner

@childControl.name: @childControl
@childControl.body: upbutton {qx.ui.form.Button} button to increase the value

@childControl.name: @childControl
@childControl.body: downbutton {qx.ui.form.Button} button to decrease the value

@param.name: @param
@param.body: min {Number} Minimum value
@param.description: Minimum value

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {Number} Current value
@param.description: Current value

@param.name: @param
@param.body: max {Number} Maximum value
@param.description: Maximum value

@description.body: Apply routine for the minimum property. It sets the value of the spinner to the maximum of the current spinner value and the given min property value.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {Number} The new value of the min property
@param.description: The new value of the min property

@param.name: @param
@param.body: old {Number} The old value of the min property
@param.description: The old value of the min property

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Apply routine for the maximum property. It sets the value of the spinner to the minimum of the current spinner value and the given max property value.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Check whether the value being applied is allowed. If you override this to change the allowed type, you will also want to override {@link #applyValue}, {@link #applyMinimum}, {@link #applyMaximum}, {@link #countUp}, {@link #countDown}, and {@link #onTextChange} methods as those cater specifically to numeric values.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
value {var}
   The value being set
@param.description: The value being set

@return.name: @return
@return.description: true if the value is allowed; false> otherwise.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Callback for "keyDown" event.
Controls the interval mode ("single" or "page") and the interval increase by detecting "Up"/"Down" and "PageUp"/"PageDown" keys.
The corresponding button will be pressed.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: e {qx.event.type.KeySequence} keyDown event
@param.description: keyDown event

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Callback for "keyUp" event.
Detecting "Up"/"Down" and "PageUp"/"PageDown" keys.
Releases the button and disabled the page mode, if necessary.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: e {qx.event.type.KeySequence} keyUp event
@param.description: keyUp event

@description.name: @description

Increments or decrements the value of the spinner.
